testcase.name: Login and find flight for one passenger online
testcase.system-out: Given I navigate to mercury tour website....................................passed And mercury tour logo is displayed..........................................passed When I enter my user name "another" on the homepage.........................passed And I enter my Password "tester" on the homepage............................passed And I click sign-In.........................................................passed And the flight finder page displayed correctly..............................passed And I select travel type "roundtrip"........................................passed And I select "1" passenger..................................................passed And I select departing from "New York" dropdown.............................passed And I select departure month "June".........................................passed And I select departure day "3"..............................................passed And I select arriving In "London"...........................................passed And I select return month "7"...............................................passed And I select return day "24"................................................passed And I Select Service Class "First class"....................................passed And I select airline "Unified Airlines".....................................passed And I click continue button on flight finder page...........................passed And Select flight page is displayed.........................................passed And I select "Blue Skies Airlines 361"flight under depart section...........passed And I select "Unified Airlines 633"flight under return section..............passed And I click continue button on the select flight page.......................passed And book a flight page is displayed.........................................passed And I enter first name"John"................................................passed And I enter last name"Smith"................................................passed And I select meal "Diabetic"................................................passed And I select card type "MasterCard".........................................passed And I enter credit card number "4319887766666"..............................passed And I select the credit card expiration month "11"..........................passed And I select the credit card expiration year "2000".........................passed And I enter first name as it appear on credit card "John"...................passed And I enter middle name as it appear on credit card "-".....................passed And I enter last name on credit card "Terry"................................passed And I click the checkbox for ticketless travel..............................passed And I enter the firstline of the credit card billing address"1325 Borregas Ave.".passed And I enter the secondline of the credit card billing address"Selenuim street".passed And I enter the city of the credit card billing address"Sunnyvale"..........passed And I enter the state or province from the credit card billing address"CA"..passed And I enter the postcode of the billing address "94089".....................passed And I select the country "UNITED STATES"....................................passed And I click the check box for the same billing address......................passed And I click the secure purchase button......................................passed Then the Flight Confirmation page is displayed..............................passed And Flight confirmation number is displayed.................................passed
